editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovioâs blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheenâand with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether itâs your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, youâll be flying high in no time.
